```{mermaid}
sequenceDiagram
  participant Release
  participant LGR
  participant MCN
  participant BON
  participant Estuary

  
  Release->>LGR: $$S_{0}$$
  Note over LGR: $$P_{LGR}$$
  LGR->>MCN: $$S_{1}$$
  Note over MCN: $$P_{MCN}$$
  MCN->>BON: $$S_{2}$$
  Note over BON: $$P_{BON}$$
  Note left of Estuary: $$\lambda$$
  LGR->>BON: $$S_{1} \cdot S_{2}$$
```
